lessons.title: Basic Greetings
lessons.content: Learn common greetings such as 'Hello', 'Hi', 'Good Morning', 'Good Afternoon', and 'Good Night'.

lessons.title: Numbers
lessons.content: Practice counting and using numbers in everyday situations, from one to ten and beyond.

lessons.title: Simple Present Tense
lessons.content: Understand the structure of the simple present tense and learn how to form correct sentences with proper subject-verb agreement.
lessons.example: Example: 'She goes to school every day.'
